spiritsExplanation:
The 'Structured & Disciplined' spirit is strongly indicated by the nature of the workout. The use of "pregnancy strength workout" and safety disclaimers further suggests structured guidance, thus a score of 0.75 is appropriate.

The 'Soothing & Restorative' spirit is also relevant due to the prenatal context, emphasizing gentle care and well-being during pregnancy. The inclusion of stretching and guidance to prevent discomfort also supports this spirit.

Other spirits like 'High-Energy & Intense' or 'Sport & Agility' are less applicable due to the prenatal focus and emphasis on safety and moderation in this workout.
